title: Elf Skill Sorting
description: Each elf is given as Name:Score. Sort elves by highest score first, breaking ties alphabetically by name. Output one elf per line in the same Name:Score format.
input_format: A single line: Name:Score, Name:Score, ... (commas may have spaces).
constraints: At least one elf; scores are integers.

sample_tests.explanation: Bob and Anna tie on score; Anna precedes Bob alphabetically.
